testcase.name: login will success with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Login page.................................................passed When user enters username as "admin"........................................passed And user enters password as "admin".........................................passed And user clicks on "SIGN IN" button.........................................passed Then user is navigated to "Dashboard" page..................................passed

testcase.name: login will not success with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Login page.................................................passed When user enters username as "admin"........................................passed And user enters password as "adminadmin"....................................passed And user clicks on "SIGN IN" button.........................................passed Then error notification "Incorrect Username or password" is displayed in Login page.passed

testcase.name: login will not success with invalid credentials 2
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Login page.................................................passed When user enters username as "admin"........................................passed And user clicks on "SIGN IN" button.........................................passed Then error validation "Please input your password!" is displayed in Login page.passed

testcase.name: login will not success with invalid credentials 3
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Login page.................................................passed When user enters password as "admin"........................................passed And user clicks on "SIGN IN" button.........................................passed Then error validation "Please input your username!" is displayed in Login page.passed
